text: The Subcommittee on Environment is a subcommittee within the U.S. House of Representatives Oversight and Government Reform Committee. ==Jurisdiction== [The Subcommittee s]hall have oversight jurisdiction over: global climate change; environmental protection, public lands, endangered species, air and water quality; oceans; public health; conservation; international agreements; energy policy, research and development; and oversight and legislative jurisdiction over regulatory affairs and federal paperwork reduction.Committee on Oversight and Reform - 116th Congress ==Members, 116th Congress== {|class=wikitable ! Majority ! Minority |- | valign=top | * Harley Rouda, California, Chair * Katie Hill, California (until October 27, 2019) * Rashida Tlaib, Michigan * Raja Krishnamoorthi, Illinois * Jimmy Gomez, California * Jackie Speier, California * Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, New York | valign=top | * James Comer, Kentucky, Ranking Member * Paul Gosar, Arizona * Bob Gibbs, Ohio * Clay Higgins, Louisiana * Kelly Armstrong, North Dakota |- ! colspan=2 | Ex officio |- | valign=top | * Elijah Cummings, Maryland | valign=top | * Jim Jordan, Ohio |} ==Historical membership rosters== ===115th Congress=== {|class=wikitable ! Majority ! Minority |- | valign=top | * Blake Farenthold, Texas, Chairman (until April 6, 2018) * Greg Gianforte, Montana, Chairman (since April 6, 2018) * Paul Gosar, Arizona * Dennis A. Ross, Florida * Gary Palmer, Alabama * James Comer, Kentucky * Michael Cloud, Texas (since April 6, 2018) | valign=top | * Stacey Plaskett, U.S. Virgin Islands, Ranking Member * Jamie Raskin, Maryland * Jimmy Gomez, California (since July 11, 2017) |- ! colspan=2 | Ex officio |- | valign=top | * Trey Gowdy, South Carolina | valign=top | * Elijah Cummings, Maryland |} ==References== Oversight Regulatory Affairs, Stimulus Oversight And Government Spending
title: United States House Oversight Subcommittee on Environment
